General.Name: Auras Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Auras Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacturing, processing, and retailing of electronic materials, computer heat dissipation modules, and other related products in China, Taiwan, Korea, Ireland, and internationally. It offers coolers, heat sinks, cooling modules, heat pipes, fans, etc. primarily for applications in notebooks, desktops, projectors, servers, and CD/DVD-ROM drives. The company also provides server, motherboard, and graphics card cooling modules; all-in-one workstations and DVD player cooling modules; and cooling products for home appliances, such as DVD and Blu-ray players, as well as LED lighting products. In addition, it offers heat flow consulting services. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 6, Wuquan 3rd Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 24891
